short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically selects 'Send as Group' when replying to posts in Google Groups

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When replying in Google Groups, sets the author of the reply to "Send on behalf of <Your Group Name>". This makes using Google Groups as a collaborative inbox easier since customers can simply Reply to the email and the response makes it back into the group.
